title: Read article by Jason Frye in July 9, 2014, section regarding dining out.  Does he have a list of restaurants, other than Chinese or Pizza, that deliver meals to homes in Wilmington?  Also, are there restaurants in the Monkey Junction area where you could pick up a dinner menu to use for calling in an order to be picked up or delivered?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2010/11/which-wilmington-restaurants-offer-delivery-other-than-pizza-and-chinese-food/
